question: What are my Medicare coverage choices?Decide if you want Original Medicare or a Medicare Advantage Plan.Original Medicare includes PartA (Hospital Insurance) and/or PartB (Medical Insurance) Decide if you want prescription drug coverage (Part D). Decide if you want prescription drug coverage (Part D). Decide if you want supplemental coverage. Medicare Advantage (Part C) includes BOTH PartA (Hospital Insurance) and PartB (Medical Insurance)
